title: Topp 10 listinn fyrir árið 2007
text:
Hérna er minn listi:
1. Magenta (orginal mix) - Arno Cost, Arias
2. I thought that (Boris Dlugosch instrumental remix) - The Migrants, Boris Dlugosch
3. Not Exactly (orginal mix) - Deadmau5
4. Need in me (orginl mix) - GusGus
5. Muranyi (orginal mix) - Pryda
6. Elements of life (orginal mix) - Tiesto
7. Lowdown Brittle (Wink's Profound Sound Interpretation) - Someone Else, Josh Wink
8. Callisto (orginal mix) - Marc Romboy, Stepan Bodzin
9. Azure (radio slave remix) - Slam, Radio Slave
10. Until further Notice (orginal mix) - Sean Danke, Sheizer Goodman
Hver er ykkar? :)

replies.text:
Hér er topp 7 mín í engri sérstakri röð..
Shiro   Ame
Praise  Art of tones
Mesmerized Miguel Migs (shur I kan guilty dub mix)
Siempre Kiko navarro (Jimpster mix)
Callisto Marc Romboy & Stephan Bodzin
Almost caught Cosmic Belt
Hidden Memories Spirit catche

ég held að bæði shiro og mesmerized séu bæði frá í fyrra :S
frábær lög samt

1. I Found U (classic mix) - Axwel
2. Magenta - Arno Cost, Arias
3. Lumberjack - Kris Menace, Alan Braxe
4. Twilight - Adam K, Soha
5. Running - Nelsen Grover
6. Something Inside Me - Mellefresh, Deadmau5
7. Yellow Brick - Noisia
8. Finished Symphony (Deadmau5 remix) - Hybrid
9. Evribadi (Fonzerelli instrumental mix) - Mauro Picotto
10. What Goes Around Comes Around (Sebastien Leger remix) - Justin Timberlake

01 John O'Callaghan feat. Audrey Gallagher - Big Sky (Agnelli & Nelson Remix)
02 Paul Van Dyk & Starkillers & Austin Leeds feat. Ashley Tomberlin - New York City
03 Cerf, Mitiska & Jaren - Light The Skies (Retrobyte Classic Electrobounce Mix)
04 Jonas Steur feat. Jennifer Rene - Fall To Pieces
05 Breakfast - The Sunlight (Original Mix)
06 Roland Klinkenberg - Mexico Can Wait
07 Vincent De Moor - Fly Away (Cosmic Gate Remix)
08 Arno Cost & Arias - Magenta (Original Mix)
09 Super8 & Tab - Needs To Feel (Wippenberg Remix)
10 Julian Jeweil - Air Conditionné
11 Ronski Speed Ft. Sir Adrian - The Space Perspective
12 Armin Van Buuren - The Sound Of Goodbye (Nic Chagall Drumbeat Re-Edit)
13 The Doppler Effect - Beauty Hides In The Deep (John O'callaghan Remix)
14 Marscruiser - Not Alone Tonight (Blake Jarrell Club Mix)
15 Chris Lake Feat. Emma Hewitt - Carry Me Away
16 Fkn Feat. Jahala - Why (Aly & Fila Remix)
17 Armin Van Buuren vs. Rank 1 feat. Kush - This World Is Watching Me (Cosmic Gate Remix)
18 Filo & Peri feat. Eric Lumiere - Anthem (Original Vocal Mix)
19 Deadmau5 - Arguru
20 Remo Con - Cold Front (Bart Claessen Remix)
John O'Callaghan feat. Audrey Gallagher - Big Sky (Agnelli & Nelson Remix) er fokking snilld!!! Okkar listar verða eflaust svipaðir.
aha .. allt spurning um réttu elementin ;)

Byrjaði ekki að hlusta almennilega á þessa senu fyrr en í sumar þannig að það er ekkert rosalega mikið þarna sem kom á undan því .. en þó =)
1. Deadmau5 - Jaded
2. Arno Cost & Arias - Magenta
3. Marc Romboy, Stephan Bodzin - Callisto
4. Commix - Be True
5. Adam K, Soha - Twilight
6. Hybrid - Finished Symphony (Deadmau5 Remix)
7. Calyx & TeeBee - Warrior
8. David Guetta - Love Is Gone
9. Deadmau5 - Faxing Berlin
10. Kilowatts, Tanner Ross - Kruger Fingers
11. Dusty Kid - Kore
12. M.A.N.D.Y., Booka Shade - Oh Superman
13. Justin Martin - The Sad Piano (Jimpster Remix)
14. Benny Benassi, Public Enemy - Bring The Noise (Pump-Kin Remix)
15. Deadmau5 - Not Exactly
“When a warrior kills another, he absorbs that fallen warriors spirit..”
Einum of gott lag. Einum of góð plata!
Nenniru nokkuð að senda mér Not Exactly? Á bara e-ð Dumb Dan Edit af því :/. Langar í instrumental.
farðu á beatport.com og keyptu þér það

1.	Samim – Heater
2.	Timo Garcia & Ricky Stone - Control The Universe
3.	Deadmau5 - Vanishing Point
4.	Chris Lake - To The Point (BSOD Remix)
5.	John Dahlback – Everywhere
6.	Mark Knight & Dave Spoon – Sylo
7.	Lexicon Avenue - That Acid Track (Rene Amesz Remix)
8.	Dirty South - Let It Go
9.	Martin Landsky - Let Me Dance (Sebo K Remix)
10.	Gui Boratto - Chromophobia
